Collins Aerospace is looking for an experienced embedded software engineering system design lead that can lead a cultural transition towards certifiable model-based design practices for our next generation control systems. This individual will be responsible for establishing standardized practices and processes for creating system models, specification models, and design models.

At Raytheon CODEX, a CNO software developer implements custom software tools and techniques. Most of the work is developed in C, C++, and Assembly. The intended platforms are embedded, Windows, and POSIX systems targeting low-level user space or kernel space execution.
